document_data.name: Disrupt Undead
document_data.mainbody: '''''Disrupt undead''''' was an [[arcane magic|arcane]] [[cantrip]] that hurt [[undead]] creatures or made them more susceptible to harm.
document_data.Effects: Prior to the [[Spellplague]], this cantrip did a small amount of damage to an undead creature at a range of {{SI|25|ft|long=yes}} (farther for more experienced casters) by firing a ray of [[positive energy]] at it. If the target resisted the spell, it had no effect. After the Spellplague, this cantrip instead reduced the protection provided by the dark forces that animated and shielded the undead creature.
document_data.Components: This cantrip required only [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s to cast.
document_data.Notable Users: * ''Disrupt undead'' was known to the [[necromancer]] [[Thavok Drusuvious]], leader of the [[Waterdeep]] cell of the [[Cult of the Dragon]] in the {{YearlinkName|1373}}.{{Cite web/Return to Undermountain/The Dragon's Legacy|11}}
